channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Safran finalises acquisition of Collins Aerospace flight controls business
Father who moved family to Russia to escape ‘woke’ America is sent to front line

item.description: New York City’s former interim police commissioner has filed a $10 million defamation claim against Mayor Eric Adams for questioning his mental fitnes...

item.title: Arkansas man pleads guilty in 2024 mass shooting at grocery store that killed 4
item.description: An Arkansas man has pleaded guilty in the mass shooting at a grocery store that killed four people and injured nearly a dozen others

item.title: Second suspect arrested in the shooting of an off-duty US customs officer in a Manhattan park
item.description: A second suspect has been arrested in connection with the shooting of an off-duty customs officer at a park in Manhattan over the weekend

item.title: Father arrested in New York in death of 9-year-old daughter he had reported missing

item.title: Postal inspectors investigating fiery car crash at California post office as an intentional act
